Description_lang: Afflicts the caster with Lycanthropy, which causes the caster to transform into a Wolf Spirit after $49170d. The Wolf Spirit form increases Physical damage dealt by $49173s1, increases attack speed by $49173s2%, and renders the caster unable to be slowed or stopped. While in this form, the caster will be unable to cast spells. Lasts $49172d.
AuraDescription_lang: Transformed into an unstoppable Wolf Spirit.Increased melee damage and attack speed.Unable to cast spells.
